input: Jesse and Lee were spending time together.  Jesse told Lee a story.What will Lee want to do next?
Ash asked Casey anything they wanted about the test questions that day.What will Casey want to do next?
Jordan found Jan's leather diary and returned it without snooping.What will happen to Jan?
Jesse's smoking affected Casey's health so Jesse threw away his cigarettes.How would you describe Jesse?
Jan eased the tracking device by adjusting a dial on the back.What does Jan need to do before this?
Cameron had trouble paying her bills after she was doing poorly at work and got fired.What does Cameron need to do before this?
Searching for his lost cat, Casey drove around town.Why did Casey do this?
Kendall grew tired after staying up all night to study.How would you describe Kendall?
